code:
s, n, k = map(int,input().split())
x = []
for i in range(k):
    hh, mm = input().split('-')
    xx = 60 * int(hh[:2]) + int(hh[3:])
    yy = 60 * int(mm[:2]) + int(mm[3:])
    if xx > yy: xx = xx - 24*60
    x += [[xx, yy]]
x.sort()
res = 0
l, r = x[0][0], x[0][1]
for i in x[1:]:
    if i[0] <= r:
        r = max(r, i[1])
    else:
        res += n * (r - l)
        l, r = i[0], i[1]
res += n * (r - l)
print(max(0, s-res))
